entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
